thread.title: Protest over Bassetlaw Hospital children's ward overnight closure
thread.title_full: Protest over Bassetlaw Hospital children's ward overnight closure | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Protest over Bassetlaw Hospital children's ward overnight closure
text:
Campaigners gather in Worksop ahead of a protest march through the town over the closure of the children's ward at Bassetlaw Hospital through the night.
Campaigners in Worksop to protest about children's ward overnight closure Credit: ITV Yorkshire The closure means that children in the hospital are moved to other hospitals overnight, before being brought back to Bassetlaw in the morning.
The Trust says the decision to close the ward overnight is a result of staff shortages and for safety reasons. David Hirst reports.
Play video Last updated Sat 25 Feb 2017 Health nottinghamshire worksop
